skills.skill: Knowledge of modern accounting theory, principles and practices, and general utility billing procedures

duties_responsibilities.duty: Establishing and maintaining positive and professional relationships with District customers, and vendors, on behalf of the Water District.
Timely processing of accounts payable (AP) transactions with a keen attention to detail and accuracy.
Performing a variety of complex AP and Administrative tasks under the direction of Manager, and in cooperation with other Staff Members.
Demonstrating exceptional problem-solving skills and a strong commitment to teamwork.
Knowledge of Quickbooks software is beneficial.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED supplemented by preferred formal coursework in accounting, business or related subjects with a minimum of two (2) years’ experience in accounts payable or payroll or any equivalent combination of training and experience which provides the required knowledge, ability and skill.
